cards.name: Coup de Grâce
cards.text:
Play: Destroy each damaged creature.
Fate: Deal 4 to each friendly creature.

cards.name: Cryptic Collapse
cards.text: Play: Discard your hand. For each card discarded this way, an enemy creature captures 1 from its own side.

cards.name: Embellish Imp
cards.text:
Each time an enemy creature is destroyed, steal 1.
Fate: Destroy the most powerful friendly creature.

cards.name: Ortannu the Chained
cards.text: After Reap: Return each copy of Ortannu’s Binding from your discard pile to your hand. For each one returned this way, deal 2 to a creature, with 2 splash.

cards.name: Solo
cards.text:
If there are no other friendly creatures in play, Solo gets +20 power and gains, “After Fight: Gain 3.“
Fate: Destroy each creature.

cards.name: Atrocity
cards.text: At the start of your opponent’s turn, that player discards the top card of their deck. They must choose the discarded card’s house as their active house this turn. Deal 1 to Atrocity.

cards.name: Bloodshard Imp
cards.text: After a creature reaps, destroy it.

cards.name: Ifraneye
cards.text:
Play: Discard your hand.
After Reap: Your opponent discards 2 random cards from their hand.

cards.name: Oh, You Shouldn’t Have!
cards.text: Fate: Your opponent gains 3.

cards.name: Poised Strike
cards.text:
After a player readies this creature, destroy it.
Fate: Skip your “ready cards” step this turn.

cards.name: Poltergeist
cards.text: Play: Use an artifact controlled by any player as if it were yours. Destroy that artifact.

cards.name: Relativity Imp
cards.text:
You cannot forge more than 2 keys each turn.
After you forge a key during your “forge a key” step, you may forge another key at current cost.

cards.name: Shaffles
cards.text: At the end of your turn, your opponent loses 1.

cards.name: They Tell No Tales
cards.text: Play: Choose a house. Destroy each creature of the chosen house. Gain 2 chains.

cards.name: A Gift of Æmber
cards.text: Play: Destroy up to 2 creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, the creature's controller gains 1.

cards.name: Banish
cards.text: Play: Put an enemy creature into your opponent’s archives.

cards.name: Carrion Wyrm
cards.text:
After Reap: Destroy an enemy creature.
Scrap: Put an enemy creature on top of its owner’s deck.

cards.name: Chasm Vespid
cards.text:
Skirmish. Splash-attack 1.
Fate: Archive each friendly creature not on a flank.

cards.name: Dark Minion
cards.text:
Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)
Destroyed: Deal 1 to each enemy creature.

cards.name: Eddy of Dis
cards.text:
Play: Shuffle a random card from your opponent’s hand into their deck.
Fate: Your opponent shuffles their discard pile into their deck. They draw a card.

cards.name: Hamstrung
cards.text: Play: Discard the top card of a player’s deck. If it is a creature, purge it.

cards.name: Infinity Strop
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, deal 4 to each creature that shares a house with the destroyed creature.

cards.name: Parasitic Arachnoid
cards.text:
Destroyed: An enemy creature captures 1 from its own side.
Fate: A friendly creature captures 2 from its own side.

cards.name: Pied Viper
cards.text:
Elusive.
After an enemy creature reaps, if there are more enemy creatures than friendly creatures, gain control of that creature.

cards.name: Skorpeon
cards.text:
Enhance .
After Reap: Deal 2 to an enemy creature for each of Skorpeon’s Dis neighbors.

cards.name: Strug
cards.text:
Play/Destroyed: Your opponent loses 1.
Fate: Lose 2.

cards.name: Traumatic Echo
cards.text: Play: Purge a card from your discard pile. During your opponent’s next turn, they cannot play cards of the purged card’s type.

cards.name: Bronze Key Imp
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
Players cannot forge their first key.

cards.name: Silver Key Imp
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
Players cannot forge their second key.

cards.name: Ortannu’s Binding
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 to a friendly creature.

cards.name: Cyber-Clone
cards.text: Play: Purge another creature. Until Cyber‑Clone leaves play, it has power equal to the purged creature’s power, and gains that creature’s armor, keywords, and traits.

cards.name: Empyrean Charge
cards.text: Play: Forge a key at +6 current cost, reduced by the total combined number of cards in both player’s archives. Discard each player’s archives.

cards.name: Exotic Pivot
cards.text:
Play: Discard the top card of your deck. If it is not a Logos card, steal 3.
Fate: For the remainder of the turn, you cannot play creatures.

cards.name: Psychic Bug
cards.text: Play/After Reap: Look at your opponent’s hand.

cards.name: Archon’s Callback
cards.text:
Omega. (After you play this card, end this step.)
Play: Draw 5 cards.

cards.name: Bit Byte
cards.text:
Skirmish.
After Fight: Put the creature Bit Byte fights into its owner’s archives.
Fate: Your opponent archives the bottom card of their deck.

cards.name: C.Æ.N.D.L.E. Unit
cards.text:
After an enemy creature reaps, draw a card.

cards.name: Director of Z.Y.X.

Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
At the start of your turn, archive the top card of your deck.

Play: Choose one:
Archive 2 random cards.
Gain 2.

cards.name: Unity Prism

Alpha.
Play: For the remainder of the turn, you may play cards from any house. You cannot play more than 4 cards this turn (including this one).
Scrap: Reveal your hand. Gain 1 for each house represented in it.

cards.name: Unstable Dale
cards.text:
After Reap: Deal 1 to each creature for each card in your hand.

cards.name: Zeff “Punch” Yardus

cards.name: Captain Cha

Elusive.

cards.name: Cutthroat Research

cards.name: Digitallia

Enhance .

cards.name: Emeritus Darn

cards.name: Hazard Zerp

Play: Deal 3 to a creature. If that creature is destroyed, draw a card.

Play/After Reap: Discard a card. If you have no cards in your hand, gain 1.

cards.name: Parallel Thinking

cards.name: Reassembly Required

Play: Put a creature into its owner’s archives.

cards.name: Reiteration

cards.name: Wild Wormhole

cards.name: Z.Y.X. Researcher
cards.text: Play: Archive the top card of your deck or the top card of your discard pile.

cards.name: Titan Sentry
cards.text:
Players cannot take their archives into their hands during their "choose a house" step.

cards.name: Avenging Aura
cards.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature gains assault X, where X is the number of forged keys your opponent has.

cards.name: Doomsayer

cards.name: Agamignus

After another Mutant creature enters play, gain 1.

cards.name: Dark Centurion

Enhance .

cards.name: Follow the Leader

cards.text: Play: Deal 3 to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, enrage each of its neighbors after it leaves play.

cards.name: Rack of Redemption

cards.name: Redeem the Crucible
cards.text:
Omega.

cards.name: Ruthless Avenger

Assault 2. Hazardous 2.

cards.name: The Mist

cards.text: After Reap: Discard the top card of your deck. Resolve that card’s bonus icons as if you had played it.

cards.name: Lay of the Land
cards.text: Play: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order. Draw a card.

cards.name: Navigator Ali
cards.text: Play/After Fight/After Reap: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

cards.name: Quintrino Flux
cards.text: Play: Choose a friendly creature and an enemy creature. Destroy the chosen creatures and each creature with the same power as either of the chosen creatures.

cards.name: T3R-35A
cards.text:
T3R‑35A may be used as if it belonged to either of its neighbor’s houses.
T3R‑35A may be played as an upgrade instead of a creature, with the text: “This creature may be used as if it belonged to either of its neighbor’s houses.”

cards.name: DAL-33-T3R
cards.text:
After Reap: Return 2 enemy creatures to their owner’s hand.
Fate: Purge the most powerful friendly creature.

cards.name: Ensign Clark
cards.text:
Enhance .
Fate: Destroy a friendly artifact.

cards.name: Future Booster
cards.text: Omni: Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Into the Warp
cards.text: Play: Each player discards the top card of their deck. Destroy each creature that shares a house with at least one of the discarded cards.

cards.name: Precision Striker
cards.text: Play/After Fight/After Reap: Discard the top 3 cards of your opponent’s deck. Put 1 of the discarded cards on the bottom of your opponent’s deck.

cards.name: Recovery Operation
cards.text: Play: Discard the bottom 3 cards of your deck. You may put any number of the discarded cards on top of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Refit
cards.text:
Play: You may move an upgrade in play to another creature.
Fate: Destroy an upgrade attached to a friendly creature.

cards.name: Reservist Jones
cards.text:
Deploy.
Play: Capture 2 for each of Reservist Jones’s non-Star Alliance neighbors.

cards.name: Scout Pete
cards.text: Play/After Fight/After Reap: Look at the top card of your deck. You may discard that card.

cards.name: Sil-A-T8
cards.text:
Enhance .
After Fight/After Reap: You may ready a non-Robot creature for each of Sil-A-T8’s Star Alliance neighbors.

cards.name: Spade Teller
cards.text: Play/After Fight/After Reap: Choose a house. Discard the top card of your deck. If that card belongs to the chosen house, gain 1.

cards.name: Strategic Feint
cards.text:
Play: Deal 1 to two enemy creatures and exhaust them.
Fate: Discard the top card of your deck. Until the end of the turn, you may not play cards of the discarded card’s type.

cards.name: Cladogenesis
cards.text: Play: Each player discards the top card of their deck and reveals their hand. Discard each card that belongs to their discarded card’s house. Each player refills their hand as if it were their “draw cards” step.

cards.name: Flying Broomstick
cards.text: This creature gains elusive, and "After Reap: Heal all damage and move all  and counters from a creature to the common supply."

cards.name: Jervi
cards.text:
Elusive.
After Reap: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand.
Scrap: Archive a card from your discard pile.

cards.name: Perilous Wild
cards.text: Play: Destroy each elusive creature.

cards.name: Punctuated Equilibrium
cards.text: Play: Each player discards their hand, then refills their hand as if it were their “draw cards” step.

cards.name: Word of Returning
cards.text: Play: Deal 1 to each enemy creature for each  on it. Move each  from those creatures to your pool.

cards.name: Break of Dawn
cards.text: Play: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Put each Untamed card discarded this way into your hand.

cards.name: Came Back Wrong
cards.text: Play: Play a creature from your discard pile and attach Came Back Wrong to it as an upgrade with the text "This creature gets –2 power and gains poison."

cards.name: Envious Venomite
cards.text:
Skirmish.
While your opponent has more  than you, Envious Venomite gains poison.
Fate: For the remainder of the turn, each enemy creature gains poison.

cards.name: Lambent Mycelium
cards.text:
After another creature enters play, put two +1 power counters on Lambent Mycelium.
Fate: Until the end of your turn, the most powerful enemy creatures gain taunt.

cards.name: Lithomancy
cards.text: Action: Reveal the top of card of your deck. If the revealed card belongs to the active house, discard it and gain 2.

cards.name: Low Dawn
cards.text: Play: If there are 3 or more Untamed creatures in your discard pile, gain 2. Shuffle each Untamed creature from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Loyal Packmate
cards.text:
Taunt.
Enemy creatures cannot be used to fight friendly creatures unless the friendly creature has taunt.

cards.name: Mushroom Man
cards.text: Mushroom Man gets +3 power for each unforged key you have.

cards.name: Æmberfly
cards.text:
Elusive. Skirmish.
After Fight: Capture 1.
After Reap: Move 1 from Æmberfly to your pool.

cards.name: Chonk Evermore
cards.text:
Play: You may give two creatures a +1 power counter. Double the number of +1 power counters on each creature.
Fate: Give each enemy creature two +1 power counters.

cards.name: Flarie
cards.text: At the start of your turn, gain 1.

cards.name: Fog Murmook
cards.text: While Fog Murmook is not on a flank, keys cost –1.

cards.name: Invigorating Shower
cards.text:
Enhance .
Play: Choose a house. Shuffle each card of that house from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Lost in the Woods
cards.text: Play: Shuffle 2 friendly creatures and 2 enemy creatures into their owners’ decks.

cards.name: Mogg
cards.text:
Play: Deal 4 to each creature with power 5 or higher.
Fate: Stun each friendly creature with power 5 or higher.

cards.name: Persistence Hunting
cards.text: Play: Choose a house. Exhaust each enemy creature of the chosen house.

cards.name: Prince Bufo
cards.text:
Enhance .
Fate: Your opponent forges a key at current cost.

cards.name: Rat Pixie
cards.text: Play/After Reap: If you have 4 or fewer, gain 1.

cards.name: Vivid Faerie
cards.text:
Enhance .
After Reap: Gain 1 for each of Vivid Faerie’s Untamed neighbors.

cards.name: Warfaline
cards.text: Play/After Fight: Shuffle the top 5 cards of a discard pile into their owner’s deck.

cards.name: Windrow Composting
cards.text:
Play: Shuffle a card from your discard pile into your deck.
Fate: Each player shuffles their discard pile into their deck.

cards.name: Ask Again Later
cards.text: Each time your opponent chooses their active house, they must name a house on your identity card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card does not match the named house, fulfill Ask Again Later.

cards.name: Bad Omen
cards.text: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if they have exactly 6, fulfill Bad Omen.

cards.name: Expect the Unexpected
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent shuffles their deck, fulfill Expect the Unexpected.

cards.name: Fate Laughs at Your Plans
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, when your opponent adds their archives to their hand, fulfill Fate Laughs at Your Plans.

cards.name: Forge Ahead With Confidence
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent forges a key, fulfill Forge Ahead With Confidence.

cards.name: Go Forth and Conquer
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, after an enemy creature is used to fight, fulfill Go Forth and Conquer.

cards.name: Heads, I Win
cards.text:
At the end of your turn, you may flip Heads, I Win.
During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent plays a creature adjacent to a creature of the same house, fulfill Heads, I Win.

cards.name: It Only Gets Worse
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent steals one or more  from you, fulfill It Only Gets Worse.

cards.name: Look How Far You’ve Come
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, after they play a creature, fulfill Look How Far You've Come.

cards.name: Outlook Not So Good
cards.text: After your opponent chooses an active house that matches no cards in play, fulfill Outlook Not So Good.

cards.name: Overreach
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, after an enemy creature is used to reap, fulfill Overreach.

cards.name: Signs Point to Yes
cards.text: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if they have  in their pool equal to or greater than the current key cost, fulfill Signs Point to Yes.

cards.name: Stars Aligned
cards.text: At the start of your opponent’s turn, if each player has the same number of creatures, fulfill Stars Aligned.

cards.name: Tails, You Lose
cards.text:
At the end of your turn, you may flip Tails, You Lose.
During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent plays a creature adjacent to a creature belonging to a different house, fulfill Tails, You Lose.

cards.name: The Cards Will Tell
cards.text: During your opponent's turn, after your opponent draws a card outside of their “draw cards step”, fulfill The Cards Will Tell.

cards.name: The Early Bird
cards.text: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if they have more  in their pool than you, fulfill The Early Bird.

cards.name: The End is Nigh
cards.text: During your opponent's turn, after 3 or more creatures have been destroyed that turn, fulfill The End is Nigh.

cards.name: The Second Mouse
cards.text: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if they have less  in their pool than you, fulfill The Second Mouse.

cards.name: Trust Your Feelings
cards.text: When a card is placed under Trust Your Feelings, name a house. The next time your opponent chooses the named house as their active house, fulfill Trust Your Feelings.

cards.name: Wasteful Regret
cards.text: During your opponent’s turn, after your opponent discards a cards from their hand, fulfill Wasteful Regret.

cards.name: Wounds Into Wisdom
cards.text: During your opponent's turn, after a friendly creature is dealt damage, fulfill Wounds into Wisdom.
